theUnbound:DefaultCommonSkill.NAME: Defend
theUnbound:DefaultCommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL theUnbound:Multiword_Keyword. theunbound:Wood theunbound:Earth theunbound:Metal theunbound:Water theunbound:Fire theunbound:Enlightened theunbound:Corrupt

theUnbound:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theUnbound:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theUnbound:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theUnbound:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theUnbound:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theUnbound:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theUnbound:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theUnbound:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theUnbound:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theUnbound:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theUnbound:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theUnbound:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theUnbound:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
